attributes.action: Require ministers to give direct & accurate answers to questions in parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Will make the government truly accountable to parliament & voters and stop politicians from avoiding their responsibilities. It will also help politicians be seen as truthful & open and rebuild the trust & faith that we need in our leaders to successfully move towards better times as a country/people. It will also promote a better form of political debate that could positively influence other forums.
attributes.background: If they don't, make them in contempt of parliament and fine them personally & put them in jail as in a court of law until they apologise and answer the question. Pass the necessary legislation/parliamentary procedures for the above to be operational.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally, and individual Ministers are responsible for their answers to questions.
